website_summaries.verdict: With good-quality wood and a lovely exterior finish, this cabinet-style wall bed performs well and delivers on comfort.
pros: Hardwood construction with an attractive cherry finish
Tri-fold memory foam mattress delivers comfort
Includes a nice storage drawer at the foot for bedding
Easy to fold out for use and up for storage
cons: Consider delivery that will bring the boxes inside

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture. All hardwood construction. Delivered 90% assembled. Great value and great bed for those with a lack of space.
customer_reviews.author: James DeMay

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet is very well constructed and looks great in our lake house
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is very well constructed and looks great in our lake house. I have decorative items on top and have no trouble with them moving as I open and close the bed. The mattress is very firm but I like that and it slept great. I live in Nebraska and it took 10 busniess days for my bed to come. My first bed came damaged. Called customer service and they took care of everything. Sent a new bed and picked up the new one plus made things right for the long wait and inconvenience. Amazon you are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Nannette Rakin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So well made (heavy) and beautiful. Mattress is high quality and very comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Harshbarger

customer_reviews.title: super nice & really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: super nice & really sturdy. allow the memory foam to relax at least 72 hours before someone can sleep on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the amount of space it takes up when not ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount of space it takes up when not in use. Quality cabinet that you could move to a different room, but hard to move over carpet because weighs 250-275 lbs. When open, your head does stick in the cabinet a little but not enough to bump your head when you raise up. Mattress seems very comfortable. I was amazed at how it puffed up after unwrapped! One person can open and close Bed-love that! Used regular Queen sized sheets on queen bed and it fit fine. Makes room feel bigger because isn’t very tall. Makes a small room multipurpose. I use mine as a guest room/playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cabinet bed
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Solid wood, as advertised, beautifully finished. Delivered on time. It's heavy, but it should be. I assembled it by myself in about an hour. I like that the frame folds out...no wheels to get hung up on carpeting. Really great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: dfinch

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed, Space Saving for Guest visits.
customer_reviews.text: One week into owning. Love it. Has port for two phones and lamp, Love that! Had amazon tech build it so no idea about putting it together, it took the guy 2 hours by himself but its easy to open and close by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: SinCity Sister

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture, works great as a spare bed
customer_reviews.author: cmom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we ordered. My first guest, sister, loved it. Said it was very comfortable. Just perfect for our space.
customer_reviews.author: Helen R.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT extra bed for guests
customer_reviews.text: GREAT extra bed for guests! Everyone is amazed that there's a bed in the cabinet, and anyone who's slept on the mattress has said it's comfortable. Love the electrical and USB ports. Easy to put together (install) with another person to help you, and easy to get it ready for your guests. It really does take just one person to get the bed ready once the unit has been installed. We get loads of compliments on this piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use as a guest bed
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet bed is wonderful. I bought it to use in an extra room as a guest bed without making it a single purpose room. This is a nice piece of furniture, very easy to get it out for company. So far, those who have used it (4) said the mattress is very comfy. I use the drawer underneath for sheets, mattress cover and pillows.
customer_reviews.author: tlckgram

customer_reviews.title: Like the product but should have been perfect condition for ...
customer_reviews.text: It was very expensive and had marks in the wood that had been touched up. One of the latches had the screws pulled loose and had marred the finish on the side. Like the product but should have been perfect condition for over $ 2000.00 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Korey Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet Bed
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It allows us to use the den all yeast long and have a bed room for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy, but manageable.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, this item was delivered promptly, was easy to assemble, and proved simple to operate and comfortable to guests.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Casey

customer_reviews.title: This is very heavy and you need two people to move and unpack.
customer_reviews.text: A pure joy to work with this company. They contacted us to let us know if was being shipped. Contacted us again when it arrived in our city. Was called and set up delivery date and time. It arrived quickly, and on the day we were notified. Beautiful wood, well made, and simple to assemble. Include d online video assembly instructions. The bed is very comfortable. Our 40 year old son has been sleeping on it for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ljch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: We received it today and I was pleasantly surprised at how well made and beautiful this is. The mattress seems comfortable but will get a real test when my daughter and her husband visit. I have limited space in this particular room and it's just right. It was easy to put together and took less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: SEA0629

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our office/guest bedroom and it is perfect. It is beautiful, solid, and was easy to assemble. It doesn't screw into the wall and is solid wood (lots of the fold down Murphy beds we had looked at were pressed/particle board and need to be mounted into the wall). The tri-fold mattress is OK on it's own and surprisingly better than expected. We added a 3" memory foam mattress topper on it last weekend whey my sibling came to visit. She has a bad back, and had no problems with the mattress and added pad -she even complimented how comfortable it is! We love this piece and will be keeping it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J

customer_reviews.title: Function
customer_reviews.text: We received the bed,(big boxes). My husband and I put it together. It takes awhile, but worth it. Not to hard if you follow directions. We haven't used it yet so I cannot comment on the comfort. Though just laying on it seems great. It looks terrific. Very pleased. We bought this to replace a hide a bed in my office. This gives us so much more room and looks great. I can set this up on my own, without any one's help. (late 60's) Function is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this bed
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this bed. It looks hand made, is made of quality wood, and is a beautiful, elegant piece of furniture. It took less than an hour to assemble and is easy to make into a bed. A very nice feature is that is has a power cord so that you can have lamps sitting on top—another feature is being able to put things, lamps, photographs, etc. on top of the furniture and not having to move it. I am very happy to have bought this bed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet is beautiful. I purchased this as an extra bed for ...
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is beautiful. I purchased this as an extra bed for guests. It was shipped carefully with no damage. I had it assembled through Amazon and was pleased with that whole process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality guest bed, looks nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Clover cube bed. Nice solid wood, comfortable mattress (we added topper), looks nice in room. Our guests hit their head on the wood ledge getting into bed, so that’s not ideal. Regarding setup, you must be strong to flip over for assembly. The two women in video is misleading. We asked for help from relatives and it was quick setup with string men. Overall good, quality guest bed for small space.
customer_reviews.author: cjr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece if furniture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very sturdy bed. Made of real wood not that pressed board garbage. We use it for company and everyone has said it was really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a buffet.......no......it's a bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Our guest bed arrived on time and in perfect condition. We are so impressed with this stylish, well made bed! First of all, it's a lovely piece of furniture, perfect for a room that is used for other things than sleeping. Thank you, Amazon, for another wonderful piece of furniture. We love your Stone and Beam Collection, also!Loo
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: Plays It's Role
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product. The cabinet is relative in size to a large dresser and looks the part. The bed folds out easily on carpet and one person can easily perform the unfolding process. The bed is comfortable, no question better than any high end pull out couch I have had the opportunity to try. I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: MGF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Made Murphy Bed Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this company and its Murphy Bed Cabinet. The cabinet is beautiful and very well made. It is apparent that this company takes great pride in the quality and durable of their furniture. The cabinet is easy to put together and thrived well protected. Although I have not slept on the bed yet, This bed surpassed all of my expectations. Additionally, this company’s customer service is outstanding , e.g., quick response time, customer oriented, and professional.
customer_reviews.author: R Burns

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and is very comfortable. We have had two different guest sleep on the bed and both gave a thumbs us. It was easy to get into the house and set up - although you do need some muscle. My husband and son were able to do it no problem. It is perfect for my spare room because now I have room for my art and a place for guests to stay comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane Chan

customer_reviews.title: Hardwood Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This a quality piece of well made hardwood furniture, not particle board or veneer. The company is easy to work with maintaining contact throughout the delivery process. We are very pleased this "murphy bed" as it fits our decor and does not appear to be a hidden bed. We want to extend our appreciation to this company for delivering a unique, quality piece of furniture at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to set up and take down with just one ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made with all wood materials. Really easy to set up and take down with just one person. Look at the dimensions as it is quite wide (about the width of 2 mattresses) so it may be to bulky for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This Murphy Cabinet Bed worked great. It is a beautiful piece of furniture. The bed is easy to fold out and in and is actually very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bostick

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great,comfortable product. Easy to assemble (I am challenged in this area). It's pretty heavy so not easy to move about as you are assembling but simple once it is together. Looks great, easy to open and close, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: phoexix234

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality with great assembly instructions. Customer service was exceptional. A freight issue was resolved with immediate response and communication. This is a good company with a good product.
customer_reviews.author: PM2

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fits my needs. Well constructed and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crisler

customer_reviews.title: Night and day Murphy cabinet bed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Murphy cabinet bed that was solid wood and this brand claimed to be solid wood. It's not solid wood. It looks like real wood but one of the veneer wood strips is peeling off the mdf board underneath. The legs at the foot of the bed protrude outwards under my sitting on the bed and I'm 175 lbs. I like the idea of this bed but it needs some structural improvements made to support the safety of this bed.
customer_reviews.author: David LO

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is worth every penney we spent on it. It is well made, easy to set up, and looks beautiful. Every guest who has slept on it said the mattress is very comfortable. It is heavy and two strong people need to carry it into your house.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a dresser but its a bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Night and Day Murphy bed is a terrific way to turn an office into a bedroom. The craftsmanship is excellent and it is packed with great care- no damage. It is beautiful in the Chocolate finish and will suit visitors with a comfortable rest on the memory foam mattress. Glad I have it!
customer_reviews.author: R Lace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, EASY to put together. It is heavy, but most of it is already done.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The repair came out perfect - can not even tell
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product arrived damaged by the forklift in the warehouse and was not discovered until I opened it. The seller arranged for someone local to repair the damage. The repair came out perfect - can not even tell. This buyer gave 5 star service - staying on top of keeping me informed during the repair process. This is a very nice piece of furniture and my guest said the mattress is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JS Oakland Park, FL

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! I was able to assemble the few parts needed all by myself. Mother-in-law said it was very comfortable. I show it to everyone that comes over.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda

customer_reviews.title: Ideal to maximize my downsizing
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed, it is exactly what I wanted for my townhome. The finish and construction is great. The people who delivered were very professional. You should know however that the piece was damaged on the back but did not go through, see the following pics.
customer_reviews.author: mrsp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture.. well made and the mattress is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and sturdy. Clever idea to store away the guest bed and save room.
customer_reviews.author: Dobbie

customer_reviews.title: ... cabinet bed was very well packaged and arrived in perfect shape. The cabinet is very well make and ...
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet bed was very well packaged and arrived in perfect shape. The cabinet is very well make and excellent quality, so it was pretty heavy. I had to move it up 2 stories in my house and since I was alone I disassembled it into it's various parts. That was easy to do since it had high quality hinges on all the parts and reattaching them was no problem. The directions made it a snap to attach the base unit. It's very quick and easy to open/close it up.
customer_reviews.author: Eric O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: High quality, perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: We were kind of blown away by how much we love this item. We've had mediocre pull out or flattening sofas for years and don't love them as sofas or beds. This is a big item but not overwhelming, and it looks great as a piece of furniture and is a really impressive, high quality guest bed. We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: KCQ

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Good quality , awesome shipping/packing job. Simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet was very easy to asseble
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet was very easy to asseble. It came in 3 pieces, 2 for the cabinet and 1 was the mattress. I'm very pleased with the color, quality, and over all comfort of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Kozar

customer_reviews.title: good quality!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful, even better than the appearance on the web. The assemble was not too hard. Very lucky, the delivery gentleman helped me to assembly the whole thing before leaving my house. The bed is comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Li-Jun Ma

customer_reviews.title: Spencer Studio was great to work with and I am so glad I ...
customer_reviews.text: Spencer Studio was great to work with and I am so glad I choose to order with them. They delivered the piece earlier then the original estimate. They stayed in contact with me so I knew when they would be here. I love the piece. It was exactly what we need in our guest room which is also my craft room. Since the piece is more like a dresser, I can set stuff on top of it when it's not being used as a bed. The under bed draw is great for storing the linens I will use with the bed. It seems very well made and so far I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: This Murphy Cabinet Bed is the BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product!! Looks great and is very well made. Packaging is very well padded. Requires very little assembly. The mattress is super comfortable. I would recommend this product to anyone. It is heavy and will require two people to complete the set up.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona guy

customer_reviews.title: Mobil comfort
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to move from wall to wall or room to room with not much effort. It makes our home office easy to double as a guest room. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Grannis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, heavy piece of furniture. I think it will work great for an extra bed when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is very comfortable easy to put on sheets and blankets. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to use! We love our new guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to quickly make up this bed for unexpected guests.
customer_reviews.text: We use our new Murphy bed for guests. It works perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: M S.

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Came almost completely assembled and looks great. Exactly as advertised solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frees up guest room...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, love it. My overnight guests sleep sound; and I can use my guest room as a home gym when there is no company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY, VERY FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: GREAT QUALITY, VERY FUNCTIONAL, & LOOKS GREAT!... THE ONLY REASON FOR NOT GIVING FIVE STARS WAS THE KNOB SCREWS ONLY WORKED WITH THE METAL KNOBS (SO WE USED THOSE). THE WOOD KNOBS ARE NICE, BUT THE PROVIDED SCREWS ARE TOO SHORT.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE S

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to covert from cabinet to bed
customer_reviews.text: This Murphy bed is very solid construction and very stylish. It is very easy to covert from cabinet to bed. We really love the design. The mattress is mostly comfortable. We will likely buy an additional mattress topper to make it more comfortable for our guests, but this is a guest bed in our house. The vendor did an awesome job of packaging for delivery, so there was no damage to the product. I highly recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Drew S

customer_reviews.title: So functional and easy to set up and put away
customer_reviews.text: So functional and easy to set up and put away. I really like that you can store the bedding in the drawer underneath. Mattress is also very comfortable. We are going to change the knobs to brass bin pulls that fit with our decor better but that is an easy switch. The wood of the cabinet is a really pretty color (just like the picture) and looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lees Rodionov

product_meta.title: Night & Day Furniture Murphy Cabinet Bed with Mattress, Cherry, Queen
product_meta.description: Color:CherryCredenza style cabinet that folds out to a queen size bed. T.V. can be placed on top and stays in place when bed is folded out. Includes a gel-infused memory foam mattress. Less-expensive then wall beds and no installation to the wall required. Can fit under a window and be moved around the room.
feature_bullets: Can fit under a window and be moved around the room

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
